$eref.description: Base definition for maintenance object objects in the API.

___name.description: A human readable name for the object

___@context.description: Indicates the type of object; individual extending types may use 'pattern' to match a specific URI

___code.description: A short(-ish) code used as an alternate (contextual) reference for the object

___@id.description: This is the resource URI for the specific object

description: Base type for maintenance objects with a 'source' vocabulary

___active.description: Whether this item type is currently in use

___source_date.description: Date the value was retrieved from the source

___source.description: A description or URI for the source vocabulary
